entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 12 April 2023
